system.description:
At 3rd level, you learn the tools necessary to help others pass through the unknown territory you routinely traverse. You gain proficiency with Navigator’s Tools and Cartographer’s Tools.

In addition, you can draw a quick map in 10 minutes with a DC 15 Cartographer’s Tools check. On a success, the map gives those navigating its area (which can be up to 10 miles by 10 miles) advantage on their Survival or Navigator’s Tools checks to avoid major hazards, find food and shelter, and pass safely through without becoming lost. On a failed check, your map is an illegible mess and provides no benefit.
